unnormalised: Arre yaar, mhaje PAN card *aani ek pavtt* pois ailem! Fattle pavtt tem chaiwalakodde aslem, hya pavtt mhaka shak asta mhoje auto-rickshaw driveran tem KYC khatir ghetlam. Atam mhaka SBI cho IFSC code ugddas hadpak yatanam, kitem tori SBIN0001234 aslem vo SBIN000ABCD? Khoreponan mhaka mhaje A/C no. che tattoo korun gheunchem podttalem dista, na tor mhaka tem-ui visrun zatlem! Mhaka fokot rokdde duddunk thambchem podttalem... oh wait, mhaka mhajo UPI pin aani ek pavtt visron gela. Facepalm!
normalised: Oh no, mhojem P-A-N card portun harounk gela! Favo pavtim tea chaiwalakodden aslem, he pavtim mhaka dubav asa mhoje auto-rickshaw choloitolean K-Y-C khatir ghetolem mhunn. Atam mhojem I-F-S-C code S-B-I khatir ugddas koruncheak yotn kortam, kitem tori S-B-I-N zero zero zero ek don tin char asa vo S-B-I-N zero zero zero A-B-C-D? Gambhirponnan vichar kortam mhojem A slash C no. tattoo korun gheunk tache adim temui visarlem mhunn! Hovuya mhaka rokhddim paisanchech vapar korcho... oh rav, mhojem U-P-I pin portun visrun ghelom. Facepalm!
